divs: sighting detailshello. over the years my husband and i have often star gazed with our binoculars. for 28 years we have watched, but lately here near by our land we are seeing more and more frequently lights in the sky that will appear to be stars, then they get brighter and taking off after sitting there for quiet some time. tthey are getting , bigger, bolder and more gather together at one time. i am really concerned what they are and doing. this happens almost every night. . i dont get any bad or good feeling, they seem to be playful. but i am alarmed because we have lived there over 30 years and have never seen so many so often. what can they be?\\ thank you.
Summary: This is more frequent than before, , they are more in numbers also
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wilderville
This sighting has never been favorited.
